rule_text: Keep centered within your lane; do not cross the lane midline. Reduce speed if lane confidence drops; stop if tracking is lost.
Adapt speed to curvature, visibility, and stopping distance. Slow before curves and intersections to stop within the visible road.
Approach an uncontrolled intersection cautiously, be ready to stop, yield to vehicles in the intersection and from the right, then proceed when clear.
When an obstacle is in your lane, decelerate and bypass smoothly within your lane; stop if no safe in-lane path exists.
Yield to pedestrians or ducks entering or occupying your path; slow to a crawl and stop if needed until the path is clearly clear.
Pass only when permitted by the lane layout and safe within your lane; ensure visibility and safe gaps; abort if safety is uncertain.
